title: Here and now
creator_credit: New South Wales Film Corporation, Julia Overton and Tom Zubrycki
brief_description: A demonstrator uses medical equipment to measure the immediate effects on the body of just one cigarette. The surprising results are discussed by the school students involved in the tests.
creator_credit_for_label: New South Wales Film Corporation, Julia Overton and Tom Zubrycki
